description:
Koushirou is a 27 year-old single man who works for a marriage agency and still lives with his father.
He hasn`t seen his mother and younger sister ever since his parents got divorced, over ten years ago. He re-encounters his sister, Nanoka, when she comes to live with them, as their home is closer to the high-school she`ll be attending.
name: Saeki Koushirou
